p: The scaled wind tunnel was formed by (i) 6 boards of 122 cm × 52 cm × 1 cm corresponding to three of the lateral surfaces of the square prism and (ii) 2 boards of 10 cm × 52 cm × 1 cm placed at the beginning and at the end of the tunnel (prism bases) to allow the storage of sand 10 cm deep. With these dimensions, the final size of the scaled wind tunnel constructed was 244 cm × 52 cm × 52 cm.
